member.name: T:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.HoverBalloon
member.summary: A sample class to manipulate ballon tooltips. Windows XP balloon-tips if used properly can be very helpful. This class creates a balloon tooltip. This becomes useful for showing important information quickly to the user. For example in a data-entry form full of controls the most important and used control is the Order Placement button. Guide the user by using this hover balloon on it. This helps in a shorter learning cycle of the application.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.HoverBalloon.MaximumTextWidth
member.summary: Sets the maximum text width of the tooltip text. At that length the tooltip will start wrapping text over to the next line.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.HoverBalloon.Title
member.summary: Sets up the title of the tooltip.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.HoverBalloon.TitleIcon
member.summary: Sets the icon for the tooltip.

member.name: T:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.EditBalloon
member.summary: A sample class to manipulate ballon tooltips. Windows XP balloon-tips if used properly can be very helpful. This class creates a balloon tooltip in the form of a message. This becomes useful for showing important information quickly to the user. Ever so often we need to avoid certain invalid characters in input textboxes. Though we do a good job of filtering the characters, we dont necessarily do a good job of informing the user. This class helps immensely under such scenarios. This also helps in a shorter learning cycle of the application. NOTE: The difference between this and other balloon classes is that this is made specifically for the edit control and displays the balloon at the caret position within the textbox.

member.name: M:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.EditBalloon.Show
member.summary: Show a balloon tooltip for edit control.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.EditBalloon.Title
member.summary: Sets or gets the Title.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.EditBalloon.TitleIcon
member.summary: Sets or gets the display icon.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.EditBalloon.Text
member.summary: Sets or gets the display text.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.EditBalloon.Parent
member.summary: Sets or gets the parent.

member.name: F:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.BalloonPosition.Absolute
member.summary: Positions using the exact co-ordinates. So if the co-ordinates are outside the screen, tip wont be shown.

member.name: F:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.BalloonPosition.Track
member.summary: Positions using the co-ordinates as a reference. Regardless of the co-ordinates, the tip will always be shown on the screen.

member.name: T:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon
member.summary: A sample class to manipulate ballon tooltips. Windows XP balloon-tips if used properly can be very helpful. This class creates a balloon tooltip in the form of a message. This becomes useful for showing important information quickly to the user. For example in a data-entry form full of controls if an error is made somewhere in entering data use this to point the bad control. This helps in a shorter learning cycle of the application. NOTE: the difference between this and HoverBalloon class is that this can be shown on demand.

member.name: M:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the MessageBalloon.

member.name: M:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the MessageBalloon.
member.param: Set the parent control which will display.

member.name: M:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon.Display(System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows or hides the tool.

member.name: M:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon.Hide
member.summary: Hides the message if visible.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon.Title
member.summary: Sets or gets the Title.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon.TitleIcon
member.summary: Sets or gets the display icon.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon.Text
member.summary: Sets or get the display text.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon.Parent
member.summary: Sets or gets the parent.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon.Align
member.summary: Sets or gets the placement of the balloon.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon.UseAbsolutePositioning
member.summary: Sets or gets the positioning of the balloon. TRUE : Positions using the exact co-ordinates, if the co-ordinates are outside the screen, tip wont be shown. FALSE : Positions using the co-ordinates as a reference. Regardless of the co-ordinates, the tip will always be shown on the screen.

member.name: P:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon.CenterStem
member.summary: Sets or gets the stem position in the tip. TRUE : The stem of the tip is set to center. An attempt is made to show the tip with the stem centered, if that would make the tip to be hidden partly, stem is not centered. FALSE: Stem is not centered.

member.name: M:BugsBox.Windows.Controls.MessageBalloon.Show
member.summary: Show the Message in a balloon tooltip.
